author: cent
title: NFT Verification Tool (Open-Source)
description: 目前缺乏社区驱动的、开源的工具、资源和标准来进一步发展Cardano上的NFT产业。

f6_assessments.q0: 提案人希望对NFT验证进行标准化，这是目前生态系统中的弱点。看来这个项目是在正确的环境中，属于整合的范畴。该提案在说明它将如何为Cardano生态系统带来标准和价值时，是非常清楚和描述的。这些标准是各地都需要的，但我很高兴提案人只专注于一个痛点，这增加了成功的可能性。这些标准有很多，而且是经过深思熟虑的。它们也属于挑战设置中的整合部分。作者不仅准备好了项目的规模，而且计划好了，并欢迎它。  这项建议将为生态系统带来急需的标准，无论谁想在cnft市场上认证一个NFT，都会知道其中的痛苦和手工劳动。作为一个开发者，我对该提案的实施没有任何担忧，但我要提到几件可以做得更好的事情。总的来说，如果这个提案在所有的生态系统中得到实施，将会有很大的影响。
f6_assessments.q1: 有很多链接和证据证明提议者的身份和技能。他们中的一部分人在社区频道中很活跃，也是社区的领导者。我肯定会加入他们在提案中提供的对话。他们对他们需要组建的团队有一个相当好的想法，因为他们已经做了，并对运行路线图中描述的所有阶段所需的时间有一个很好的把握。预算可以分解得更好，因为有些项目费用对我来说仍然不清楚。  对项目如何实施和要遵循的整个过程有一个非常好的解释。这提供了一个更好的整体可信度。  技术方面是正确的，没有提到很多细节，因为提案的分析阶段仍有待完成。该提案是经过深思熟虑的，很明显，已经并将在其中投入大量的精力。成功实施的挑战已经得到考虑。该项目与已经完成的工作同步，并计划为ntf制定一个不断发展的标准，以便通过提案中公布的开放源码库轻松使用和验证。总的来说，这是一个可行的项目，我希望它能得到投票支持。
f6_assessments.q2: 正如我已经提到的，我认识一些提议者本人，他们被证明是伟大的社区成员，在与他人合作和考虑他们的反馈时感到非常高兴。所提到的关键绩效指标是相关的，而且不是太谦虚。衡量标准与提案的成功相一致。路线图和里程碑与收集、分析和实施信息的时间跨度相匹配。对一个可怕的问题有一个清晰和易懂的描述。作为一个开发者，我将大大受益于验证NFT的标准化方式，但作为一个社区成员，当我知道所有的市场平台都遵循相同的NFT发展标准时，我将更加安全。   一个沉重的任务，正确的人已经坐下来解决。他们会让社区参与到每一步的工作中。我鼓励人们加入他们的对话，无论该提案是否被投票通过。

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal is within the challenge goal, because I think that this implementation will be core for the Cardano ecosystem and for the future of the smart contracts and NFT development.
This proposal is a great implementation that increase NFT uses and to support transparency and accountability of what NFT code verification tools will do, because all of us know that the process of having NFTs verified on different marketplaces is very manual and lacks any standardized approach
The proposal clearly articulates the contest, the problem and how it will add value to the Cardano NFT ecosystem and for all of the stakeholders. Well done the existent NFT Guild repository (https://github.com/shelley-dev/cardano-nft-verification) that allow to better understand the software code and applications.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer team states that it has the necessary experience and also proposer team is SPO and 20 tears of developer experience, so the given metrics measure what the proposer wants to do, the success of his actions and the description of the success key points are well explained.
The scope of the solution is well explained (e.g. how the funds will be spent, what features will be implemented, how improve the customer experience on NFT issues and managing, things this NFT will do, and so on…).
In my opinion (I'm 20 years experienced senior information manager on financial sectors) the budget requested is coherent with the elapsed.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer provides a very detailed plan for the implementation with milestones and a defined time horizon; the proposer also adds some information about adoption and delivery of the solution, also the proposer has mentioned possible difficulties and how to deal with them.. The proposer hasn't considered challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal clearly states that the existing marketplaces lack a proper standard for the verification process, if all marketplaces follow a common research-based standard it would benefit creators, and nft users as well. Such well-defined research-based apps can give more confidence in the catalyst process also. Already NFT marketplaces are growing, implementing such solutions would be a greater benefit to the community in the long run.
f6_assessments.q1: Proposer provides the details that they are SPO's, NFT creators and have built tools for the Cardano community, which would have sufficient experience and capability to implement the current proposal, However, providing some more proofs/links would have made it better. Adding created NFT links, and some links to the profiles of who are the people involved would add more value to the proposal. The budget breakdown is mentioned very clearly and reasonable. The timeline is divided realistically and can be achieved, the implementation plan is detailed, since the implementation phases require communication with community/NFT creators the timeline taken looks reasonable.
f6_assessments.q2: The roadmap provided in the proposal is very detailed and the community can easily follow the implementation steps till the completion of this project.  The successful implementation of this proposal should result in many/all the nft marketplaces/nft creators following the defined standard thus making the verification process for nft users/community transparent. Since the proposal indicates it's a completely open-source tracking the progress of the project can be done easily by following the proposer's campaign and github(while it reached the development process).

f6_assessments.q0: Stealing and copying NFT then publishing to other marketplace is easy now and it's a big problem in the whole NFT industry nowadays, the idea of making an NFT verification tool will protect its owner and make marketplaces cleaner. With over 36,000 policy IDs and NFT projects on Cardano which can easily benefit from this open-source tool to further add value to the Cardano ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: The team has already developed a similar tool in another project, and they also shared that project in the proposal. Throughout the detailed plan in the proposal, the team shows their expertise in this field into detailed explanations of their phases of development and features very carefully. To me, provided info in the proposal is enough for assessing that they can do this project well without any doubt.
f6_assessments.q2:
Even the roadmap with just simple outlines but each development month of these outlines are clear in the proposal and all easy to audit their work, of course, the timeline is sufficient to the team ability.
Their KPIs/ OKRs also look promising and fit with the plan and solution they will do.

solution: 一个合作和一致的方法和进程，探索和建立工具、标准和资源，为Cardano NFTs创造价值
experience: 20年的开发者经验，SPO，链上数据验证工具创建者，NFT创建者，以及专注的社区成员。
